programme.desc: After a job goes wrong, two hit men are ordered by their crime boss to cool their heels in Bruges. They don't make good tourists and soon find themselves in the oddest of circumstances.

programme.title: Age of Heroes
programme.desc: This action adventure documents the true story of the elite 30 Commando unit, formed during World War II by the man who would later become novelist Ian Fleming, and their risky mission in Norway.

programme.title: Tell it to the Bees
programme.desc: A shunned small-town doctor and beekeeper in post-war Britain befriends a struggling mother and son, helping them discover that love can be found in many forms.

programme.title: Red Joan
programme.desc: Inspired by the true story of English-born Joan Stanley, who was recruited by the KGB in the mid 1930s and went undetected as a British spy for over a half a century.

programme.title: Colette
programme.desc: Set at the dawn of the modern age, this is the story of a woman who has been long denied her voice going to extraordinary lengths to reclaim it.

programme.title: Absolutely Anything
programme.desc: A group of aliens bestow upon a random Earthling the ability to make absolutely anything happen, to see if he uses the power for good or for evil.

programme.title: High-Rise
programme.desc: A doctor moves into a London skyscraper where rising tensions and class warfare lead to anarchy.

programme.title: Neds
programme.desc: Encompassed by violent street gangs, neglectful parents, bullying teachers and a lack of positive role models, a studious, but emotionally abandoned kid turns thug.

programme.title: The Professor and the Madman
programme.desc: James Murray begins compiling words for the first edition of the Oxford English Dictionary in the mid 19th century, receiving over 10,000 entries from an asylum patient.

programme.title: Ironclad
programme.desc: Paul Giamatti, James Purefoy, Kate Mara and Brian Cox star in this rollicking Robin Hood-style adventure.

programme.title: Hurricane
programme.desc: The tale of the Polish pilot who alongside his comrades of the Polish Air Force, joins the British Royal Air Force to fight during the Battle of Britain.

programme.title: Bend It Like Beckham
programme.desc: An Indian girl born in England disobeys her strict family in search of a dream: becoming a soccer star like her idol, David Beckham.

programme.title: The Liability
programme.desc: A weary assassin hires a gangster's cocky stepson as his driver to show him the ropes. But a stunning woman upsets the applecart after a hit in this witty caper.

programme.title: Their Finest
programme.desc: Catrin, an untried screenwriter, and a makeshift cast and crew work under fire to make a film to lift the nation's spirits, and inspire America to join the war.

programme.title: Quant
programme.desc: The life of Mary Quant, the designer often credited with the invention of the mini skirt, chronicling her rise from a fashion-conscious tomboy to a daring avant-garde designer.

programme.title: Felicia's Journey
programme.desc: A lovesick young woman searches for the father of her unborn child in seedy Birmingham and becomes involved with a mysterious catering manager.

programme.title: Vita and Virginia
programme.desc: In 1920's, London, Virginia Wolf meets fellow author Vita Sackville-West. Despite both of them being married, they embark on an affair that later inspires a novel.

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: A gripping courtroom drama which tells the story of 12 ordinary Australians who are selected for jury duty in a murder trial in which a woman stands accused of killing a child.

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: Detective Sam Chedid takes the stand as various pieces of evidence are introduced to the court, some of which raise questions about Nathan Spears' involvement.

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: The Crown calls Claire's best friend, Amita, to the stand. As the trial gets more complex, so too does the jury room dynamics, as their personal lives become increasingly entangled.

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: Kate Lawson's provocative artwork takes centre stage in the courtroom. The Crown raises questions around her artistic methods, as well as revealing a complicated mental health diagnosis.

programme.title: The Twelve

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: The jurors are taken to Kate's house to observe a demonstration of the Crown's case theory, before Kate's brother, Robbie, takes the stand.

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: Claire's mother, Diane, takes the stand. In support of her sister, Kate, she throws suspicion onto Nathan as she further reveals the tumultuous relationship between him and Claire.

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: When Claire's boarding school mistress, Fiona, takes the stand, a shock revelation changes the course of the trial. Jury room dynamics are tested as tensions reach boiling point.

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: When Nathan lies under oath about the affair, an enraged Kate refuses Colby's advice not to testify, but will the secret between Kate and her sister explode under the pressure of the revelations?

programme.title: The Twelve

programme.title: Mr Inbetween

programme.title: Mr Inbetween

programme.desc: People are not always what they appear to be and a good strong name is important. It's also important to lock your car when you leave it.

programme.title: The Last Anniversary
programme.desc: Sophie Honeywell has just inherited a house on Scribbly Gum Island - a mysterious gift that threatens to unearth secrets held close by the three generations of women.

programme.title: The Last Anniversary
programme.desc: As Sophie settles into Scribbly Gum Island, she starts to dig further into the Baby Munro Mystery, while preparing to host the family for their first monthly dinner party since Connie's death.

programme.title: The Last Anniversary
programme.desc: Sophie discards one unsuitable suitor, just as another enters her life. Grace continues to struggle with motherhood, and her own mother, Enigma. Sophie and Veronika make a big discovery.

programme.title: The Last Anniversary

programme.title: The Dirty Dozen
programme.desc: Twelve American soldiers, all criminals, get a chance at redemption on a killing mission in World War II.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Forced into slavery by the corrupt heir to the throne, Roman general Maximus becomes a gladiator. His prowess in the arena leads him to Rome, the Colosseum, and a showdown with the new emperor.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Earth is covered with water and the human race struggles to survive on dilapidated boats and makeshift floating cities.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: A Russian submarine commander attempts to defect to the US, bringing both sides to the brink of war.

programme.title: The Game
programme.desc: Run by the shadowy Consumer Recreations Services, the Game never quite declares its rules or objectives, but soon Nicholas finds himself in its grasp, and his ordered life starts to fall apart.

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: A story of a down-and-out con artist who trades lifestyles with a well-to-do investor. Two wealthy power players set the wheels turning with a crazy bet and the comedy gets richer by the minute.

programme.title: Up In Smoke
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, two free-spirited pot-heads decide to join forces in their endles search for substances to snort, smoke, or drop. This is the first film in the Cheech and Chong series.

programme.title: Every Which Way But Loose
programme.desc: Philo Beddoe likes beer, brawling and country music. When he falls for a sexy singer, he sets out to win her with Clyde his orangutan in tow.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: Robin vows to avenge his father's death when he is murdered by the Sheriff of Nottingham.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Things are really hoppin' at Rydell High when Danny discovers the object of his summer fling, Sandy, has moved to town and enrolled in his school.

programme.title: Operation Petticoat
programme.desc: During World War II, a commander finds himself stuck with a decrepit (and pink) submarine, a con man executive officer, and a group of army nurses.

programme.title: Back To The Future II
programme.desc: Marty McFly returns, this time travelling forward to 2015 with wacky Doc Brown to save his kids. Their crazy time-travels have a mind-bending effect on history.

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: An orphaned autistic savant who deciphers a government code in a magazine triggers a national security alarm that makes him an assassin's target.

programme.title: Cliffhanger
programme.desc: A year after his friend's death, Gabe must return to the dreaded mountain peaks, where he finds himself trapped in a desperate battle against criminals, nature and himself.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Miami cops, Marcus Burnett and Mike Lowrey, have 72 hours to find $100 million worth of heroin that was stolen from the basement of police headquarters.

programme.title: Bad Boys 2
programme.desc: Burnett and Lowrey reunite as out-of-control, trash-talking cops. Bullets fly, cars crash, and laughs explode as they pursue a whacked-out drug lord from the streets of Miami to the barrios of Cuba.

programme.title: Fright Night
programme.desc: Teenage Charley Brewster is a horror-film junkie, so it's no surprise that when a reclusive new neighbor moves next-door, Brewster becomes convinced he's a vampire.

programme.desc: Suburbanite Ray Peterson's plan for a peaceful vacation is disturbed by a creepy new family on the block in this outrageous suspense-comedy directed by Joe Dante.

programme.title: Uncle Buck
programme.desc: An idle, good-natured bachelor, Uncle Buck is the last person you would think of to watch the kids. However, during a family crisis, he is suddenly left in charge of his nephew and nieces.

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: When Saturday detention started, they were the Jock, the Princess, the Brain, the Criminal, and the Basket Case, but by that afternoon they had become closer than any of them could have imagined.

programme.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
programme.desc: An extraterrestrial finds a friend in 10-year-old Elliot, while members of a task force work day and night to track down the whereabouts of Earth's first visitor from outer space.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An unforgettable and hilarious portrait of life's most rewarding occupation: Parenthood. The Buckmans are a modern-day family facing the age-old dilemma of trying to raise children the right way.

programme.title: Foul Play
programme.desc: This bizarre, Hitchcockian comedy sees a kooky divorcee and a bumbling Federal agent take on a posse of Hollywood weirdos planning to assassinate the Pope.

programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.desc: Two Hollywood divas' surgery-enhanced rivalry goes beyond the grave.

programme.title: Casino
programme.desc: Greed, deception, money and murder envelop two mobsters and a devious trophy wife running a Las Vegas casino.

programme.title: First Blood
programme.desc: When a small town police chief arrests John Rambo, he must make a daring escape and prepare himself for a one man war.

programme.title: Dante's Peak
programme.desc: Without warning day becomes night, air turns to fire and the ground runs with molten terror. This is a spectacular volcano disaster movie with heart-pounding suspense.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: A Russian submarine commander attempts to defect to the US, bringing both sides to the brink of war.

programme.desc: Crafts, fashion, products, buildings, and food: explore a diverse range of Japanese designs and the ideas and values of their creators. Our presenters visit designers at work to reveal new stories.

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: An in-depth look at the realities of Asia today - a dynamic region which faces political, economic, cultural, and technological change.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Frontrunners
programme.desc: In Hiroshima, as atomic bomb survivors age, preserving their memories has become a pressing issue. We follow Sumioka Kenta's efforts to further the cause of peace, through the creativity of youth.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Japan in Focus
programme.desc: In 2024, natural disasters devastated the fishing grounds of the ama (free divers) in Wajima, Noto. We follow their efforts to survey the seabed and revive their tradition.

programme.title: Newsroom Tokyo
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Yasuda Junichi directed "A Samurai in Time," a playful film made on a shoestring budget that became a word-of-mouth hit. Yasuda, who is also a rice farmer, gives us the behind-the-scenes story.

programme.title: Impacts: Climates Change the World
programme.desc: Global warming is impacting ecosystems and bird habitats in the world's mountainous regions. In the Japanese Alps, various efforts are underway to protect the endangered Japanese rock ptarmigan.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE
programme.desc: The top 3 geisha idol celebrities in Edo: Tomimoto Toyohina, Takashima Ohisa, and Naniwaya Kita. See how Kitagawa Utamaro, the master of female beauty has illustrated them so differently.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: Nuclear medicine therapy involves delivering radiation-emitting drugs directly inside the body to treat refractory cancers. We explore the mechanism of the therapy and the latest developments.

programme.title: Rethinking Human Security/Africa
programme.desc: Focuses on the panel discussion at TICAD 9 held in Yokohama, titled "Human Security and Economic Development in Africa: Addressing Multidimensional Challenges and the Future Beyond 2030."

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: German urbanist Chris Dimmer focuses on the community-building potential of Japan's public bathhouses, or "Sento." He hopes that people living alone can rediscover the value of these bathhouses.

programme.title: Japan's Top Inventions
programme.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: smokeless grills.

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: French journalist and "sento ambassador" Stephanie Crohin promotes sento, or public bathhouses, on social media. She tells Peter Barakan about her love for the heartwarming world of public baths.

programme.title: Witnesses to Cambodian Genocid
programme.desc: Fifty years after the Cambodian Genocide, survivors -both victims and those involved in the killings- reflect on how and why Cambodians turned against one another, and on the deep scars left behind.

programme.desc: Yokota Megumi was 13 when North Korea abducted her. This is the story of the Yokota family's over 40-year struggle to bring their daughter home as the dark side of North Korean agents comes to light.

programme.desc: Okinawa is home to "Ryukyu Glass," a local industry for over 100 years. Matsumoto Sakae uses discarded bottles to make things to be loved and never again thrown away, doing his part to reduce waste.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Okinawa is home to "Ryukyu Glass," a local industry for over 100 years. Matsumoto Sakae uses discarded bottles to make things to be loved and never again thrown away, doing his part to reduce waste.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: The North Korean Abductions
programme.desc: North Korean agents abducted at least 17 Japanese citizens around the late 1970's. Only 5 returned. We interviewed over 100 former investigators and others to uncover why the case remains unresolved.

programme.title: Impacts: Climates Change the World
programme.desc: Global warming is impacting ecosystems and bird habitats in the world's mountainous regions. In the Japanese Alps, various efforts are underway to protect the endangered Japanese rock ptarmigan.

programme.title: History of a Traditional Fabric
programme.desc: Yamanashi / Shibata Fumie (product designer) "Kaiki" is a thin, brightly colored silk fabric. Shibata discovers how threads are arranged to produce a layered effect that resembles a digital image.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: People from around the globe who put down roots in Japan offer a glimpse into their lives and the hardships they face in Japanese society.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Japan
programme.desc: The Jomon period dates roughly from 13,000 to 300 BC. We examine various aspects of Jomon society, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: the Oyu Stone Circles.

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: When disaster strikes, it can be hard to find people trapped under rubble, while fire, volcanic eruption, or nuclear accidents may bar entry entirely. That's where disaster response robots can help.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to mud. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: A new version of Radio Japan's Easy Japanese is coming to TV first this time. Learn simple expressions you can put to use whether you're visiting or staying. Tune in and start speaking.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: Culture Crossroads comprises several regular programs with the theme of creating a multicultural society. They look at international exchange programs and give tips on disaster preparedness.

programme.title: Hello! NHK World Japan
programme.desc: We intorduce the contents and activities of NHK WORLD-JAPAN to make the station and programs known to more people all over the world. This is the window of the station to the world.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Cinematic Journey
programme.desc: Kyle Card hikes along the 1000km trail following the Pacific Coast in northern Japanwhere he discovers local lifestyles, stunning nature, traces of the area's 2011 disaster, and resilient people.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode spotlights ukiyo-e artist Sharaku's debut work "The Actor Otani Oniji III as Edobei."

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites in Japan
programme.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

programme.title: YONEZAWA
programme.desc: A 700-year-old hot spring, Shirabu Onsen, is maintained via daily trips up the slopes of the 2,000-meter mountain where it sits. See the hot spring's guardian at work, in gorgeous time-lapse footage.

programme.title: Biz Stream
programme.desc: This upbeat program combines business and economic news with in-depth feature stories that give you a closer look at the latest trends within Japan and around the world.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Inami Shishimai is a type of lion dance performed in Toyama Prefecture. Adults play the role of the shishi while a child is the shishi-tori, whose job is to pacify the shishi with sacred objects.

programme.title: Japan Delish
programme.desc: Crisp, hot, and delicious Japanese gyoza! How did gyoza come to be so beloved in Japan? Taste the delicious truth for yourself!

programme.title: Nun's Cookbook
programme.desc: The temple chefs show us how to make su-no-mono with dried daikon radish. Just mix rehydrated daikon with red radish and sweet vinegar, and this tasty pink-colored dish is ready to serve.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: Stories about people, stories about life. Intimate portraits of people from around Japan, each leading diverse lives while enriching lives of others.

programme.title: Satoyama Kitchen Spring
programme.desc: At the Satoyama Kitchen guesthouse in Hida Takayama, chef Nobuko, her cameraman husband Makoto and their cat Tama take us on a tasty journey of local cuisine served with a side of seasonal scenery.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Herbal Symphony
programme.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

programme.title: The Beauty of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, two naginata (polearms) associated with legendary warriors: Benkei and Tomoe Gozen.

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: Kyoto in the autumn: the old capital is even more beautiful when dressed in fall colors. Witness the contemplative and quiet beauty of Kyoto through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Color Out Of Space
programme.desc: A family's retreat to rural life quickly crumbles when a meteorite crashes into their front yard. They attempt to battle a nebulous entity that they can barely understand.

programme.title: The Fall
programme.desc: A bedridden stuntman entrances a little girl with tales of exotic heroes. As his health reaches the point of peril so does the story he's telling, with dramatic consequences. An epic fantasy.

programme.title: Pusher
programme.desc: A failed drug deal lands Frank in debt to a ruthless and dangerous Copenhagen drug lord.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Chen Wing Yan, a young police officer, has been sent undercover as a mole in the local mafia. Lau Kin Ming, a young mafia member, infiltrates the police force.

programme.title: The Raid
programme.desc: A SWAT team is trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs. Stranded on the sixth floor, they must fight their way through the city's worst to survive.

programme.title: You Were Never Really Here
programme.desc: Joe is a hired gun who rescues trafficked girls, using brutal methods against those responsible.

programme.title: Wrong Place
programme.desc: A meth cook hunts down the former police chief in order to silence him before he can deliver eyewitness testimony against his family.

programme.title: Police Story
programme.desc: A kung-fu policeman (Jackie Chan) must protect a female witness (Brigitte Lin) from a Hong Kong drug lord for whom she used to work.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: A story told both forwards and backwards in time about an ex- insurance investigator, unable to remember new thoughts, who uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.

programme.title: Under The Silver Lake
programme.desc: Sam, a disenchanted 33-year-old finds a mysterious woman in his apartment's pool. When she vanishes, he embarks on a quest across LA, leading him down a path of mystery.

programme.title: What Lies Below
programme.desc: A 16-year-old girl returns home from camp and learns her mother has a new boyfriend, one she intends to marry; a man whose charm, intelligence and beauty make him look like he's not human at all.

programme.title: New Life
programme.desc: A mysterious woman on the run, and the resourceful fixer assigned to bring her in. Their two unique stories inextricably link, as the stakes of the pursuit rise to apocalyptic proportions.

programme.title: Prisoners Of The Ghostland
programme.desc: In the treacherous frontier city of Samurai Town, a notorious criminal must break an evil curse in order to rescue an abducted girl who has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: God is a Bullet
programme.desc: After his ex-wife is murdered and his daughter is kidnapped, Bob Hightower, infiltrates the group to hunt down their leader with the help of the cult's only female victim escapee.

programme.title: Arctic
programme.desc: Sole-survivor of a plane crash, and stranded deep within the Arctic Circle, Overgard is waiting to be rescued, when a sudden turn of events finds him no longer on his own.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: From their base in the city sewers, turtle heroes Michelangelo, Raphael, Leonardo and Donatello are on a mission to defeat an evil warlord and wipe out crime.

programme.title: The Science of Sleep
programme.desc: A man entranced by his dreams and imagination is love-struck with a French woman and feels he can show her his world.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, Chan Wing Yan goes undercover in the triads as Lau Kin Ming joins the police. Both sides face a common threat from a rival crime boss. (Subtitles)

programme.title: Dobermann
programme.desc: The Dobermann and his gang have been hitting the headlines. Banks, post-offices, bullion vans! The whole works! An anthology of robbery, a compilation of hold-ups!

programme.title: Vivarium
programme.desc: A young couple looking for the perfect home find themselves trapped in a mysterious labyrinth-like neighbourhood of identical houses.

programme.title: Police Story 2
programme.desc: A Hong Kong cop's unusual policing methods result in his demotion to traffic duty, despite his success in fighting crime. Meanwhile, an old enemy is released from prison and sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
programme.desc: Teenagers are tortured, chopped up and impaled on meat hooks by a demented backwards family. This grisly 1974 blood-curdler ranks with Psycho and Halloween as a landmark in the horror/slasher genre.

programme.title: Winnie the Pooh: Blood and Honey
programme.desc: After Christopher Robin abandons them for college, Pooh and Piglet embark on a bloody rampage as they search for a new source of food.

programme.title: Terrifier
programme.desc: On Halloween night, Tara Heyes finds herself as the obsession of a sadistic murderer known as Art the Clown.

programme.title: Re-Animator
programme.desc: A medical student (Jeffrey Combs) brings his headless professor back from the dead with a special serum.

programme.title: Children of the Corn
programme.desc: While driving through Nebraska two young lovers stumble upon a cult made up of murderous, demon-worshiping children. Based on a Stephen King horror story.

programme.title: Crabs!
programme.desc: In the middle of prom night, a swarm of murderous crabs descends upon a small coastal town.

programme.title: Day of the Dead
programme.desc: The flesh-eating undead have wiped out every last vestige of the civilised world. Deep underground, a group of scientists and soldiers work to find a cure for the unstoppable plague.

programme.title: Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A very handsome gentleman finds the love of his life, but suffers an accident and needs to have his face reconstructed through surgery after being severely disfigured.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II
programme.desc: The heroes in a half-shell are back. Our fearsome foursome go after the glowing canister that has slipped into the hands of the evil Shredder and his mutant allies, Rahzar and Tokka.

programme.title: What Lies Below
programme.desc: A 16-year-old girl returns home from camp and learns her mother has a new boyfriend, one she intends to marry; a man whose charm, intelligence and beauty make him look like he's not human at all.

programme.title: Heathers
programme.desc: Veronica meets a James Dean-type newcomer who suggests they kill off the popular kids and end the cruel, unfair treatment the girls impose on unpopular kids at school.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, months after the first film, Ming suspects a superintendent is a triad mole, while years earlier, Yan undertakes his first mission. (Subtitles).

programme.title: Jungle
programme.desc: An enthusiastic young adventurer follows his dreams into the Amazon jungle with two friends and a guide with a mysterious past.

programme.title: Police Story 3: Super Cop
programme.desc: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.

programme.title: Super Mario Bros.
programme.desc: Two Brooklyn plumbers, Mario and Luigi, must travel to another dimension to rescue a princess from the evil dictator King Koopa and stop him from taking over the world.

programme.title: I Kill Giants
programme.desc: The story of a teenager who struggles through school and family life by escaping into a fantasy world of magic and monsters.

programme.title: The Navigator: A Medieval Odyssey
programme.desc: A young 14th Century boy with acute psychic powers believes that he can rescue his fellow villagers by tunnelling their way through the earth. To their surprise they come out in New Zealand in 1988.

programme.title: Top Knot Detective
programme.desc: Takashi Takamoto begins writing jingles for a well-known Japanese company and ends up creating a bloody series of samurai action that, over time, becomes a cult series.

programme.title: Project Wolf Hunting
programme.desc: When dangerous criminals on a cargo ship are transported from the Phillipines to South Korea, they unleash a sinister force after an escape attempt leads to a riot.

programme.title: Showgirls
programme.desc: Nomi Malone has what it takes to make it as a Las Vegas showgirl - what she doesn't have is a way in. To survive, she accepts the only job available, lap dancing at a seedy club.

programme.title: Night of the Living Dead
programme.desc: The radiation from a fallen satellite causes the recently deceased to rise from the grave and seek the living to use as food.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III
programme.desc: When a magic sceptre accidentally transports April back through time to 16th-century Japan, the boys take off in hot pursuit, cowabungling their way right out of the sewers.

programme.title: District B13
programme.desc: Captain Damien must team up with Leito, a local insurgent from District 13, to defuse a neutron bomb that has fallen into the hands of a local drug lord, Taha, and rescue Leito's sister Lola.

programme.title: District B13: Ultimatum
programme.desc: Explosive sequel set in a futuristic Paris. Corrupt cops conspire to launch a nuclear strike and take over a ghetto terrorised by marauding drug gangs and killers. Subtitles.

programme.title: Demonic Toys
programme.desc: Two gunrunners and a pregnant policewoman (Tracy Scoggins) are trapped in a warehouse with a bad boy's toys.

programme.title: Good Boy
programme.desc: Christian, a millionaire heir, meets Sigrid, a young student, on a dating app. They hit it off, but there's only one problem: Christian lives with Frank, a man who dresses up and constantly acts like a dog.

programme.title: Cypher
programme.desc: Paranoia drives this hi-tech cyber thriller when a computer programmer who turns to corporate espionage is caught in a spiral where even his own identity is put in doubt.

programme.title: The Wind
programme.desc: Lizzy is settling a remote stretch of land on the 19th-century American frontier, when she begins to sense a sinister presence that seems to be borne of the land itself.

programme.title: Prisoners Of The Ghostland
programme.desc: In the treacherous frontier city of Samurai Town, a notorious criminal must break an evil curse in order to rescue an abducted girl who has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: Howling IV: The Original Nightmare
programme.desc: A successful author moves to a small town after suffering a mental breakdown and is tormented by demons and werewolves.

programme.title: Timecrimes
programme.desc: A man accidentally gets into a time machine and travels back in time nearly an hour. Finding himself will be the first of a series of disasters of unforeseeable consequences.

programme.title: Thesis
programme.desc: A Spanish film student (Ana Torrent) finds a videotape showing the torture and murder of a missing coed.

programme.title: Severance
programme.desc: A bonding weekend goes horribly wrong for seven colleagues who find themselves facing the chop when they are sabotaged by a deadly enemy. Only the smartest will survive this brutal office outing.

programme.title: Synchronic
programme.desc: Two New Orleans paramedics' lives are ripped apart after they encounter a series of horrific deaths linked to a designer drug with bizarre, other-worldly effects.

programme.title: Crabs!
programme.desc: In the middle of prom night, a swarm of murderous crabs descends upon a small coastal town.

programme.title: New Life
programme.desc: A mysterious woman on the run, and the resourceful fixer assigned to bring her in. Their two unique stories inextricably link, as the stakes of the pursuit rise to apocalyptic proportions.

programme.title: Day of the Dead
programme.desc: The flesh-eating undead have wiped out every last vestige of the civilised world. Deep underground, a group of scientists and soldiers work to find a cure for the unstoppable plague.

programme.title: Arctic
programme.desc: Sole-survivor of a plane crash, and stranded deep within the Arctic Circle, Overgard is waiting to be rescued, when a sudden turn of events finds him no longer on his own.

programme.title: Society
programme.desc: A Beverly Hills teen (Billy Warlock) discovers his parents are part of a gruesome orgy cult for the social elite.

programme.title: The Last Stop in Yuma County
programme.desc: Stranded at an Arizona rest stop, a travelling knife salesman gets thrust into a high-stakes hostage situation by the arrival of two bank robbers who will stop at nothing to protect their ill-begotten fortune.

programme.title: The Paper Tigers
programme.desc: Three Kung Fu prodigies have grown into washed-up, middle-aged men. But when their master is murdered, they must juggle their dead-end jobs, dad duties, and old grudges to avenge his death.

programme.title: Upstream Color
programme.desc: A woman is abducted and hypnotised with an organic material harvested from a specific flower. When she falls for a man, the two realise he may also have been subjected to the same process.

programme.title: Lars and the Real Girl
programme.desc: Lars is content with his artificial girlfriend: a life-sized doll named Bianca. When he develops feelings for an attractive co-worker, Lars finds himself lost in a unique love triangle.

programme.title: Caligula: The Ultimate Cut
programme.desc: Excess, violence and corruption mark the notorious emperor's reign in first-century Rome.

programme.title: Deliver Us
programme.desc: When a nun in a remote convent claims immaculate conception, priests investigate, concerned she will give birth to twin boys: one the Messiah, the other the Anti-Christ.

programme.title: Amulet
programme.desc: An ex-soldier is offered a place to stay at a decaying house inhabited by a young woman and her dying mother. Falling for her, he suspects something sinister is going on.

programme.title: Final Cut
programme.desc: Life imitates art when the cast and crew of a low-budget zombie flick start to turn into the living dead.

programme.title: Vesper
programme.desc: Struggling to survive with her father after the collapse of Earth's ecosystem, 13-year-old Vesper must use her wits, strength and bio-hacking abilities to fight for the future.

programme.title: Paramedics
programme.desc: Australia's paramedics fight to save lives in a race against time. Mike and Eamon treat the teenage victim of a brutal assault. Ray and the Air Ambulance crew help an unlucky gardener.

programme.title: Bondi Rescue
programme.desc: Cyclonic swells bring 12-foot waves. Harries attempts a tough rescue, while lifeguards also face drunken youths and test drone life vest tech.

programme.title: Embarrassing Bodies
programme.sub-title: Back To The Clinic Part 1 Revisit
programme.desc: The team revisit Adrian, whose huge piles were memorably fixed the previous year, and Janice, a mastectomy patient, who finally completes the tattoo treatment for a new nipple.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A former New York family court judge, Judge Judy acts as a true moral compass for people seeking guidance, resolution and a little common sense.

programme.title: Judge Judy

programme.title: Border Security: America's Front Line
programme.desc: US Customs and Border Protection officers clear travellers at land, air and sea, inspecting cargo for contraband, weapons and illegal entrants to secure the nation.

programme.title: Border Security: Australia's Front Line
programme.desc: Officers from Home Affairs, Border Force and Quarantine enforce immigration, customs, quarantine and finance laws at Australia's borders.

programme.title: Police Ten 7
programme.desc: In New Zealand, the term 'Police Ten 7' means 'Police have arrived on the scene'. This unique fly-on-the-wall reality series brims with action as it follows urban cops on the beat.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: On the corner of Station St and Broadway in Chelsea, Peter is called to the scene of a car accident. A driver was taking her two friends home, took her eyes off the road and ended up smashed.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect leaves a parfait behind, an armed driver tells a tall tale, and a heated dispute ends with animal control called in.

programme.title: A&E: After Dark
programme.desc: Lifts the lid on the night shift at Hull Royal Infirmary, capturing NHS staff tackling raw night-time challenges with exclusive behind the scenes access.

programme.title: Helicopter ER

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Dylan enjoys his work at the pub until Ray reminds him of the debt. Meanwhile Joe goes pleading for help from Caleb but it doesn't go as he wishes.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Asha reaches the end of her tether and moves out. Abi reconsidered her divorce demands.

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Peter pulls rank as he plans a surprise that could backfire, Stacey makes a decision for her family, and Harry is overwhelmed by a growing situation.

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are? UK
programme.desc: Sue Perkins learns about the German branch of her family, who were refugees during WWII.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Bert Large's restaurant is in trouble. He can't afford to throw a charity event for Florence Dingle's cat sanctuary and is chased by loan shark Alastair Tonken for a debt.
